questions.text: Which character has the power of "the look"?
What snack would Pedro's mother keep in every part of their motorhome?
What is the only song left in the children's portable tape player after being searched by border agents?
questions.answer: The "Shipoopi" song, a TV recording of Meredith Wilson's "The Music Man"

questions.text: What does Mexican music to Americanized ears sound like?
Which character must give up their mule and cows?
What items get taken from the family as they return to the United States?
questions.answer: Nothing gets taken from them on the way back in

questions.text: What candy causes an interesting chemical reaction when shared with a child in the neighborhood?
What does the abuelito decide to do after his grandchildren have been tricked into buying fake fireworks?
questions.answer: The children's abuelito refuses to fight for them, reminding them that money is not worth dying for

questions.text: does the main character have eight brothers and sisters?
did the main character's grandfather work as a food runner during the Mexican revolution?
does the main character buy a massive pig shaped cookie in hopes of attracting a girl?
does the main character perform surgery on a deer?
must the main character help re-bury his grandmother after the rising water table threatens her burial plot?
is the main character tricked into buying fake fireworks?
does a character get an embarrassing haircut, a mix between "The Fonz" and "Vicente Fernandez"?
